body_text: If a recipe would like to rely on ping data in the telemetry object that we expose, it likely wants the most up-to-date data possible. Archived pings (which we currently use) are, well, archived, and so maybe we should be looking at including the current ping data as well / instead.
body_html: If a recipe would like to rely on ping data in the telemetry object that we expose, it likely wants the most up-to-date data possible. Archived pings (which we currently use) are, well, archived, and so maybe we should be looking at including the current ping data as well / instead.
title: Telemetry data in the environment is only using archived data
body: If a recipe would like to rely on ping data in the telemetry object that we expose, it likely wants the most up-to-date data possible. Archived pings ([which we currently use](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/recipe-client-addon/lib/EnvExpressions.jsm#L36-L57)) are, well, archived, and so maybe we should be looking at including the current ping data as well / instead.
